H0.text: Liverworts are most often found along stream beds.

H1.text: Liverworts are most often found in the ocean.

H2.text: On mountains, liverworts are most often found.

H3.text: In deserts, liverworts are most often found.

A4.text: Liverworts are not found in the sea.

A5.text: Liverworts are most common in moist tropical areas.
